title: Update on Rotating Game Modes and Twisted Treeline

replies.body: Nobody cares where is URF ?
If nobody cared where URF was then there wouldn't be 30 comments worth of people bitching about it in every Riot post since April 1st. It WILL come, show some fucking patience.

Maybe he meant to put a comma after cares...
So he meant nobody cares about this announcement, where is URF?
Either ways it's just rude the way he asked for it.

Deleted
-Mindstar
Why 11:00 am to 3:00 am?

As with all queues, we evaluate the player numbers that will provide a healthy matchmaking experience.  At these times, we believe the queue will have a better chance of delivering good matchmaking (both queue time and match quality).
I don't think people that play between 3am-11am really care about "healthy matchmaking". Why not just make it available for the whole time? Really doesn't make sense.
its 11am to 3am, not the way you wrote it, only 8 hours in the morning will it be unavailable
I think his point was that players who wants to play in those hours of the night don't really care about healthy matchmaking.
for those who are incredibly smart, 11am-3am is 11am,12pm,1pm,2pm,3pm,4pm,5pm,6pm,7pm,8pm,9pm,10pm,11pm,12am,1,am,2am,3am.
Why only the 3 days in the week aswell, what stops it from being open the whole week{{item:3152}} ??

Hi,

In the first announcement about the Rotating Game Mode queue, we shared that URF will be appear at least twice during 2016.  We haven't announced specifically when that will happen though.  You can read more here - http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/announcing-rotating-game-mode-queue

Cheers
Mindstar

URF is possibly League of Legend's biggest player draw event; whether the players be active or inactive, and is a favorite among the community. Will URF be on for a longer duration than the other gamemodes, considering this? 
Personally I think it would be a smart move to keep it on longer, given that URF commonly has things like special skins or promotional videos done by content creators on YouTube specifically for it.

If URF is going to appear 2 times this year, doesn't that mean we will only get it for 6 days? I was really looking forward to playing URF for a few weeks but chances are I will probably be busy three quarters of the time URF is up...
the dam 12 year olds that don't know how to read
yeah man.. 1 week holiday no URF su.cks!
Can i ask how long Urf will be on for ?

11 am to 3 am. For 3 days.

Surely you can work that out?
Will I be able to get key fragments in the rotating game mode?
Yes! Champion Mastery and Loot has been customized for the RGM queue. So you can earn chests and keys just as you can with SR.
Awesome, does that mean it will also be added to Aram and TT?
Why still no Ranked 3v3?
Ranked 3v3 has stricter population requirements than Normal Twisted Treeline. We do evaluate this as we do for all of our queues, however it is not likely to come to OCE in the near future.

If by 'stricter requirements' you mean 'not enough people will play it to make the queues short', I'm sure people would rather a long queue than no queue at all.

Edit: I get that this also affects matchmaking, but maybe more people will play it than you guys have theorised!

Would you consider a dynamic ranked queue for TT as the only form of TT queue? It wouldn't impact the queue time and could have its own ranking system so playing it wouldn't affect your normal rank, but you could still have solo queue or duo queue players playing it as well as people that want to do a serious 3v3 match.

Why do OCE get disadvantaged for RGM? How is it any harder to have the que open from 11am Friday to 3am Monday? It seems like a stupid decision and going to suck when URF is on rotation, which lets be honest, most people are looking forward to playing. We're going to get quite a few less potential play hours over the whole rotation for what reason? Disappointed in this decision.
any idea of when the rotating game queues will start being able to be played?{{summoner:21}}
In an upcoming patch. Unfortunately we can't give you a hard date that this will come out.

why bother turning it off at 3 am just leave it on 24 hours friday and saturday and turn it off on sunday at midnight, cause i play super late and alot of my friends do to also i am AWST so it turns of at 11pm my time which is also really upsetting please just make it 

Rotating Game Mode
Friday: 9:00am - 11:00am AEST
Saturday: 11:00am - 11:00am AEST
Sunday 11:00am - 11:59pm AEST


that would be so much more entertaining and fun rather then having it turn off in the late hours of the morning because WA, NT and SA are 2-3 hours behind so we have to wait longer to play it, do us a solid one and help the west side of Oz out!!
will the game mode doom bots be out someone throughout the rotation?!

Hey, I think that the rotating game modes is a good idea, however I'm a little unsure you're going about it the best way. I have three questions. Twisted Treeline used to be permanent, what is the point of not having it permanent? Do you think that by it being irregular it makes it more of a novelty and hence appealing to players? I don't think so, I don't see why it needs to rotate at all. Also with the rotating game modes, those three days may be inconvenient to some people. So why not just have it as a normal seven day rotation system: one week of ... then one week of ... I don't understand the obsession with three days. That is all, I would be really grateful is someone from Riot cleared these up with me, it might make me respect and understand the system a lot more. :)
Also, when reading other comments, turns out a lot of people play outside those hours. Why not 24 hours a day?
I play from 8am - 10 am NZ time. How am I supposed to play the game modes? {{item:3070}}
Hey, I was just wondering whether hextech loot aka chests and fragments are available to be obtained on Twisted Treeline?
Awesome, glad to hear. I used to play a lot of TT when i first played League, back before the update. I should really give the new TT a real go this week.
Any updates on the possibility of adding Draft Normal, or of Blind Pick Normal being changed to Draft Normal for OCE?
Do the game modes change every weekend or is it in block rotation? Like one weekend its URF and the next it's different or that in say like 2 weekend blocks as an example?
LET URF BE FREE!!!!!! lol
Will there be a list of gamemodes included in the rotating queue?
I think Ascension will be first game mode on the rotating que (its the one on PBE according to some utubers *redmercy*)
oh cool :)
Why are there time-frames? I would absolutely love to wake-up in the morning and play some URF with my friends, but fuck logic...
Love that this is happening, thank you lots riot. Keep up the good work.{{summoner:30}}
wow, Monday just got the shaft. but no one cares about Monday anyway.
cool, thanks
